1A3A2 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3A2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working under partial shade?
1A3A3 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3A3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working under partial shade?
1A3A4 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3A4 - In the last working week did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out under partial shade?
1A3B1 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3B1 - In the last working week, how many hours per day did you spend working out in the open?
1A3B2 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3B2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working out in the open?
1A3B3 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3B3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working out in the open?
1A3B4 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3B4 - In the last working week, did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out in the open?
1A3C1 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3C1 - In the last working week, did you have your windows open in the vehicle you were working in?

1A3C1A2 MECH_aUVR_RADIO_11_1A3C1A2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., long sleeve shirts) when working in the vehicle?

qlabel: 1 MECH_aCLH_RADIO_12_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
